MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Bryn Mawr and surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:45PM due to repairs required to a faulty piece of equipment on the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Due the repairs required we now expect the power to be restored by 1AM via generator. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:27PM on 1st February 2021.
